scripts.dev: bun run start:watch & bun run stripe
scripts.deploy:patch: bun install && bun run dockerfile && bun pm version patch && bun run deploy:commit && bun run deploy:gcloud
scripts.deploy:minor: bun install && bun run dockerfile && bun pm version minor && bun run deploy:commit && bun run deploy:gcloud
scripts.deploy:major: bun install && bun run dockerfile && bun pm version major && bun run deploy:commit && bun run deploy:gcloud
scripts.deploy:gcloud: gcloud run deploy launch-hero-backend --source . --project launch-hero --allow-unauthenticated --platform managed --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/launch-hero/launch-hero-backend/launch-hero-backend:latest
scripts.dockerfile: bun run dockerfile:build && bun run dockerfile:tag && bun run dockerfile:push
